Source file src/github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-lib/core/trigger/context.go

     1	package trigger
     2	
     3	import (
     4		"context"
     5	
     6		"github.com/TIBCOSoftware/flogo-lib/core/data"
     7	)
     8	
     9	type key int
    10	
    11	var attrKey key
    12	
    13	// NewContext returns a new Context that carries the trigger data.
    14	func NewContext(ctx context.Context, attrs []*data.Attribute) context.Context {
    15		return context.WithValue(ctx, attrKey, attrs)
    16	}
    17	
    18	// FromContext returns the trigger data stored in ctx, if any.
    19	func FromContext(ctx context.Context) ([]*data.Attribute, bool) {
    20		u, ok := ctx.Value(attrKey).([]*data.Attribute)
    21		return u, ok
    22	}
    23
